overview: The story of Zagor-Te-Ney, hero of the Darkwood forest, which is on this occasion situated on the slopes of Fru≈°ka gora and other wooded areas of Vojvodina, where this low-budget amateur film was made by a comics/film enthusiasts led by Svetozar Ljubojevic from Novi Sad.
title: Zagor - A Chief without Tribe
